Bases: src.spawning.spawning.DensitySpawningCalculator

It uses epsilon * numTraj trajectories proportional to their energy and the rest inversely proportional to each cluster’s population

class src.spawning.spawning.SpawningCalculator[source]¶

The purpose of this abstract class is to contain the behaviour of the different strategies for the spawning. Spawning is the way in which we split the different explorers at the begining of each epoch.

calculate(clusters, trajToDivide, clusteringParams, currentEpoch=None)[source]¶
divideInverselyProportionalToArray(array, trajToDistribute)[source]¶

Divides “trajToDistribute” inversely proportional to the values in “array”

divideProportionalToArray(array, trajToDistribute)[source]¶

Divides “trajToDistribute” proportionally to the values in “array”

divideTrajAccordingToWeights(weights, trajToDistribute)[source]¶

weights must be normalized (i.e. sum(weights) = 1)
